entry.title: $2100 // MASSIVE 2 BR in the heart of Buswick 2 Blocks to JMZ
entry.content:
Spacious 2 bedroom apartment in Bushwick!

Bedrooms are on opposite ends of the apartment, allowing for optimal privacy.

Newly renovated bathroom! Each bedroom fits a king sized bed plus additional furniture! Separate kitchen and living room with charming french doors.

Two blocks to the M and J trains! Steps from HappyFun Hideaway, Birdy's, Archie's, Mr. Kiwi, Norbert's, Umi Burger, Gallery Bar, and much more!

NO BROKER FEE! Contact now to schedule a viewing!
Heat and hot water included in the rent and pets are welcome!
GOOD CREDIT AND INCOME A MUST: CO - SIGNERS WELCOME!!

Six one seven// 8 4 zero// 2 six 6 4

entry.title: $1999 // The last apartment you'll need to look at in BUSHWICK - sick 1 bed!
entry.content:
The last apartment you'll need to look at in BUSHWICK - sick 1 bed!

NO BROKER'S FEE

- 2 blocks from the Dekalb L train and 10 min to Knickerbocker M train
- Steps from local favorite, Maria Hernandez Park!
- Tons of awesome restaurants, cafes and bars nearby like Three Diamond Door, Alphaville, Roberta's + many more!

- Recently renovated
- Separate kitchen
- Stainless steel appliances - dishwasher!
- Hardwood floors
- High ceilings
- BIG living room
- Queen size, spacious sunny bedrooms
- Pets OK on approval!

Immediate move in available
First, last & security to move in
MUST have good income & good credit - guarantors OK!

Text Kyle and mention the cross streets to view today!

entry.title: $2400 // BIG with real life ☺☺~ closets and get great natural light
entry.content:
Please text Vaner at show contact info and mention the ID# 21672
2 Bed / 1.5 Bath in Bushwick, Brooklyn. Pets Upon Approval. Nearby subway stations include: Knickerbocker Av, Gates Av. Charming 2 bed in a two family townhouse set back from the street. Features tremendous space/light throughout. The living-room is gigantic and open, and connects to a separate kitchen with tons of counter/cabinet space! Both bedrooms are BIG with real life closets and get great natural light. If the tile floors seem weird, think of it as a good excuse to get a dope rug. AMAZING PRIVATE BACKYARD! Short walk to the Knickerbocker M and Kosciuszko J. Don't sleep on this one. We can help you find roommates on Nooklyn.

AMENITIES
Private backyard
Natural Light in Living Area
Eat In Kitchen
